page.title: 04BEECHDALE SWIMMING BATHS
page.content:
We interviewed the Supervisor at{ {Beechdale Baths.}We asked him how long the baths had been open. He said, 'For 15 years in February 1985.' Have you ever had any accidents? 'Yes. A few minor accidents and 3 where people have drowned.' How many people use the baths? 'About{1000}during the week and{700 to {1000}at weekends.' Do you like the baths? 'Yes, because I like the{diving tank} and because I meet lots of people.' How long have you been working here? 'I've been working here 18 months.'
{Emma Smith & Kapila Sharma}
